name: Learn English through Song Lyric
description: Learn English through Song Lyrics: Want to learn English while having a seriously good time? Do you love to sing? Here are more awesome songs for karaoke, so you can learn English with lyrics!  The app helps users improve listening skill, pronunciation and vocabulary by watching and listening to a music video with lyrics.  Learn English through song lyrics: Listen and learn the lyrics and have more english songs new.  Songs are a great source of real-life language and you can use music to practise lots of different language skills. Most of all, songs are a fun way to learn English!  Enjoy learning languages for free playing with the music videos and filling in the lyrics of your favorite songs: English  Get now the Best apps for learning english with song lyrics  Lyrics finder song lyrics offline  Help to learn English with Song Lyrics and Music Video.  Easy to use with thousands of song lyrics.  Lyrics of the immortal songs.
